S06sspp2_4u:8138: evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:8146: anāgāmiphalam aśubham iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:8151: evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti yeṣāṃ copadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:8159: arhattvam aśubham iti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:8163: pratyekabodhim aśubhety upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti,
S06sspp2_4u:8171: pratyekabodhim anātmeti gaveṣamāṇāḥ pratyekabodhim aśubheti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:8176: mārgākārajñatām aśubhety upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti,
S06sspp2_4u:8184: mārgākārajñatām anātmeti gaveṣamāṇāḥ mārgākārajñatām aśubheti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:8189: sarvākārajñatām aśubhety upadekṣyanti. evaṃ ca vakṣyanti ya evaṃ carati sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratīti,
S06sspp2_4u:8197: sarvākārajñatām anātmeti gaveṣamāṇāḥ sarvākārajñatām aśubheti gaveṣamāṇāḥ prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikāyāṃ cariṣyanti. iyaṃ kauśika prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikā.
S06sspp2_4u:8199: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upaviśanti upadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:8200_0: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayan prathamāyāṃ bhūmau sthāsyasi. dvitīyāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8200_1: bhūmau tṛtīyāṃ bhūmau caturthyāṃ bhūmau pañcamyāṃ bhūmau ṣaṣṭhyāṃ bhūmau saptamyāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8200_2: bhūmau aṣṭamyāṃ bhūmau navamyāṃ bhūmau daśamyāṃ bhūmau sthāsyasi,
S06sspp2_4u:8201_0: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra dhyānapāramitāṃ bhāvayan prathamāyāṃ bhūmau sthāsyasi. dvitīyāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8201_1: bhūmau tṛtīyāṃ bhūmau caturthyāṃ bhūmau pañcamyāṃ bhūmau ṣaṣṭhyāṃ bhūmau saptamyāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8201_2: bhūmau aṣṭamyāṃ bhūmau navamyāṃ bhūmau daśamyāṃ bhūmau sthāsyasi,
S06sspp2_4u:8202_0: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra vīryapāramitāṃ bhāvayan prathamāyāṃ bhūmau sthāsyasi. dvitīyāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8202_1: bhūmau tṛtīyāṃ bhūmau caturthyāṃ bhūmau pañcamyāṃ bhūmau ṣaṣṭhyāṃ bhūmau saptamyāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8202_2: bhūmau aṣṭamyāṃ bhūmau navamyāṃ bhūmau daśamyāṃ bhūmau sthāsyasi,
S06sspp2_4u:8203_0: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra kṣāntipāramitāṃ bhāvayan prathamāyāṃ bhūmau sthāsyasi. dvitīyāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8203_1: bhūmau tṛtīyāṃ bhūmau caturthyāṃ bhūmau pañcamyāṃ bhūmau [ŚsP_II-4_214] ṣaṣṭhyāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8203_2: bhūmau saptamyāṃ bhūmau aṣṭamyāṃ bhūmau navamyāṃ bhūmau daśamyāṃ bhūmau sthāsyasi,
S06sspp2_4u:8204_0: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra śīlapāramitāṃ bhāvayan prathamāyāṃ bhūmau sthāsyasi. dvitīyāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8204_1: bhūmau tṛtīyāṃ bhūmau caturthyāṃ bhūmau pañcamyāṃ bhūmau ṣaṣṭhyāṃ bhūmau saptamyāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8204_2: bhūmau aṣṭamyāṃ bhūmau navamyāṃ bhūmau daśamyāṃ bhūmau sthāsyasi,
S06sspp2_4u:8205_0: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra dānapāramitāṃ bhāvayan prathamāyāṃ bhūmau sthāsyasi. dvitīyāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8205_1: bhūmau tṛtīyāṃ bhūmau caturthyāṃ bhūmau pañcamyāṃ bhūmau ṣaṣṭhyāṃ bhūmau saptamyāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8205_2: bhūmau aṣṭamyāṃ bhūmau navamyāṃ bhūmau daśamyāṃ bhūmau sthāsyasi. taś ca nimittayogenopalambhayogena,
S06sspp2_4u:8206: sa kālasaṃjñayā prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayiṣyati. iyaṃ kauśika prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikā.
S06sspp2_4u:8207: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā evam upadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:8208_0: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvaya sattvaṃ kulaputra prajñāīpāramitāṃ bhāvayan
S06sspp2_4u:8208_1: śrāvakabhūmiṃ samatikramiṣyasi pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ samatikramiṣyasi. iyaṃ kauśika
S06sspp2_4u:8209: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā prajñāpāramitām upadiśanti,
S06sspp2_4u:8210: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvaya sattvaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayan bodhisattvanyāmam avakramiṣyāmy anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntipratilapsyase,
S06sspp2_4u:8211_0: sattvam anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntipratilabhya bodhisattvābhijñāsu sthitvā buddhakṣetrād
S06sspp2_4u:8211_1: buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkramiṣyasi tāṃ tathāgatārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān satkurvan gurukurvan
S06sspp2_4u:8211_2: mānayan pūjayan naivam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:8212: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā evam upadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:8213_0: yaḥ kulaputra prajñāpāramitām udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati
S06sspp2_4u:8213_1: yoniśaś ca manasikariṣyati so 'prameyam asaṃkhyeyam aparimāṇaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasaviṣyati.
S06sspp2_4u:8213_2: evam upadiśantas teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:8214_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8214_1: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā evam upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputrātītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ tathāgatānām
S06sspp2_4u:8214_2: arhatāṃ [ŚsP_II-4_215] samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ yat kuśalamūlaṃ tat prathamacittotpādam upādāyaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:8215_0: yāvad anupādhiśeṣāṃ nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtāṃ tat sarvam abhisaṃkṣipyānumodyānuttarāyāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8215_1: samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmaya evam upadiśantas te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:8218: katham upadiśanto bhagavaṃs te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti?
S06sspp2_4u:8220_0: iha kauśika kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8220_1: caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvaya mā
S06sspp2_4u:8220_2: ca rūpam anityam iti samanupaśyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:8221: rūpaṃ svabhāvaśūnyaṃ yo rūpasya svabhāvaḥ so 'bhūvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitāyā prajñāpāramitā na tatra rūpaṃ nitya iti vā anityam iti copalabhyate,
S06sspp2_4u:8222: rūpam eva na saṃvidyate nopalabhate. kutaḥ punar nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā bbaviṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:8223: evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:8224: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā evam upadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:8225: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvaya mā ca vedanām anityeti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:8226_0: vedanāsvabhāvena śūnyāyā vedanāyāḥ svabhāva so 'bhāvo yo bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā
S06sspp2_4u:8226_1: tatra na vedanā nityeti copalabhyate. vedanaiva tatra na samvidyate nopalabhyate
S06sspp2_4u:8226_2: kutaḥ punar nityo vā anityo vā bhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ
S06sspp2_4u:8227_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8227_1: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8227_2: bhāvaya mā ca saṃjñām anityeti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:8228_0: saṃjñāsvabhāvena śūnyāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitāyāḥ
S06sspp2_4u:8228_1: prajñāpāramitā na tatra saṃjñā nityeti vā anityeti vopalabhyate. saṃjñaiva tatra
S06sspp2_4u:8228_2: na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityo vā anityo vābhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika
S06sspp2_4u:8228_3: te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:8230_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8230_1: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8230_2: bhāvaya mā ca saṃskārān anityā iti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:8231_0: saṃskārāḥ svabhāvena śūnyāḥ yaḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvā yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitāyāḥ
S06sspp2_4u:8231_1: prajñāpāramitā tatra na saṃskārā nityā iti vā anityā iti vopalabhyate. saṃskārā eva
S06sspp2_4u:8231_2: tatra na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityā vā anityā vā bhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ
S06sspp2_4u:8231_3: kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:8232_0: punar aparaṃ. kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8232_1: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8232_2: bhāvaya mā ca vijñānam anityam iti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:8233_0: vijñānaṃ svabhāvena śūnyaḥ yo vijñānasya svabhāvaḥ so bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitāyāḥ
S06sspp2_4u:8233_1: prajñāpāramitā tatra na vijñānaṃ nityam iti vā anityam iti vopalabhyate. vijñānam
S06sspp2_4u:8233_2: eva tatra na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā bhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ
S06sspp2_4u:8233_3: kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:8234_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8234_1: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8234_2: bhāvaya mā ca cakṣur anityam iti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:8235_0: cakṣuḥ svabhāvena śūnyo yaś cakṣuṣaḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā
S06sspp2_4u:8235_1: tatra na cakṣur nityam iti vā anityam iti vopalabhyate. cakṣur eva tatra na saṃvidyate.
S06sspp2_4u:8235_2: kutaḥ punar nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā bhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrā
S06sspp2_4u:8235_3: vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:8236_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8236_1: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8236_2: bhāvaya mā ca śrotram anityam iti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:8237_0: śrotraṃ svabhāvena śūnyo yaś śrotrasya svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā
S06sspp2_4u:8237_1: tatra na śrotraṃ nityam iti vā anityam iti vopalabhyate. śrotram eva tatra na saṃvidyate.
S06sspp2_4u:8237_2: kutaḥ punar nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā bhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ [ŚsP_II-4_217] kauśika
S06sspp2_4u:8237_3: te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:8238_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8238_1: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8238_2: bhāvaya mā ca ghrāṇam anityam iti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:8239_0: ghrāṇasvabhāvena śunyā yo ghrāṇasya svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā
S06sspp2_4u:8239_1: tatra na ghrāṇaṃ nityam iti vā anityam iti vopalabhyate. ghrāṇam eva tatra na saṃvidyate.
S06sspp2_4u:8239_2: kutaḥ punar nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā bhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrā
S06sspp2_4u:8239_3: vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:8240_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8240_1: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8240_2: bhāvaya mā ca jihvām anityam iti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:8241_0: jihvā svabhāvena śūnyā yo jihvāyāḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'bbāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā
S06sspp2_4u:8241_1: yā prajñāpāramitā tatra na jihvā nityeti vā anityeti vopalabhyate. jihvaiva tatra
S06sspp2_4u:8241_2: na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityā vā anityā vā bhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika
S06sspp2_4u:8241_3: te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:8242_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8242_1: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8242_2: bhāvaya mā ca kāyam anityam iti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:8243: kāyaḥ svabhāvena śūnyo yaḥ kāyasya svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā yā prajñāpāramitā,
S06sspp2_4u:8244_0: tatra na kāye nitya iti vā anitya iti vopalabhyate. kāya eva tatra na saṃvidyate.
S06sspp2_4u:8244_1: kutaḥ punar nityo vā anityo vā bhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ
S06sspp2_4u:8245_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8245_1: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8245_2: bhāvaya mā ca mano 'nityam iti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?

S06sspp2_4u:8468_2: vā anityā iti vopalabhyate. āveṇikabuddhadharmā eva tatra na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar
S06sspp2_4u:8468_3: nityā vā anityā vā bhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro
S06sspp2_4u:8469_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputraḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ [ŚsP_II-4_242]
S06sspp2_4u:8469_1: kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitāmupadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra
S06sspp2_4u:8469_2: prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvaya mā ca srotaāpattiphalam anityam iti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:8470_0: srotaāpattiphalaṃ svabhāvena śūnyaṃ yaḥ srotaāpattiphalasya svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo
S06sspp2_4u:8470_1: 'bhavaḥ sā prajñāpāramita yā prajñāpāramitā tatra na srotaāpattiphalaṃ nityam iti
S06sspp2_4u:8470_2: vā anityam iti vopalabhyate. srotaāpattiphalam eva tatra na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar
S06sspp2_4u:8470_3: nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā bhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro
S06sspp2_4u:8471_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputraḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayanikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8471_1: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8471_2: bhāvaya mā ca sakṛdāgāmiphalam anityam iti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:8472_0: sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ svabhāvena śūnyaṃ yaḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalasya svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo
S06sspp2_4u:8472_1: 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramita yā prajñāpāramitā tatra na sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ nityam iti
S06sspp2_4u:8472_2: vā anityam iti vopalabhyate. sakṛdāgāmiphalam eva tatra na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar
S06sspp2_4u:8472_3: nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā bhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro
S06sspp2_4u:8473_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8473_1: kuladuhitṝṇaṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8473_2: bhāvaya mā cānagāmiphalam anityam iti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:8474_0: anāgāmiphalaṃ svabhāvena śūnyaṃ yo 'nāgāmiphalasya svabhavaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhavaḥ
S06sspp2_4u:8474_1: sā prajñāpāramita yā prajñāpāramitā tatra nānāgāmiphalaṃ nityam iti vā anityam iti
S06sspp2_4u:8474_2: vopalabhyate. anāgāmiphalam eva tatra na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityaṃ vā anityaṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8474_3: vā bhaviṣyati. evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:8475_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8475_1: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8475_2: bhāvaya mā cārhattvam anityam iti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:8476_0: arhattvaṃ svabhāvena śūnyaṃ yo 'rhattvasya svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā
S06sspp2_4u:8476_1: yā prajñāpāramitā tatra nārhattvaṃ nityam iti vā anityam iti vopalabhyate. [ŚsP_II-4_243]
S06sspp2_4u:8476_2: anāgāmiphalam eva tatra na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityaṃ vā anityaṃ vā bhaviṣyati,
S06sspp2_4u:8477: evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:8478_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8478_1: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8478_2: bhāvaya mā ca pratyekabodhim anityam iti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:8479_0: pratyekabodhiḥ svabhāvena śūnyā yaḥ pratyekabodheḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ
S06sspp2_4u:8479_1: sā prajñāpāramitā yā prajñāpāramitā tatra na pratyekabodhir nityeti vā anityeti vopalabhyate.
S06sspp2_4u:8479_2: pratyekabodhir eva tatra na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityā vā anityā vā bhaviṣyati.
S06sspp2_4u:8479_3: evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:8480_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikanāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8480_1: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8480_2: bhāvaya mā ca mārgākārajñatām anityeti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:8481_0: mārgākārajñatā svabhāvena śūnyā yo mārgākārajñatāyāḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ
S06sspp2_4u:8481_1: sā prajñāpāramitā yā prajñāpāramitā tatra na mārgākārajñatā nityeti vā anityeti vopalabhyate.
S06sspp2_4u:8481_2: mārgākārajñatā eva tatra na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityā vā anityā vā bhaviṣyati.
S06sspp2_4u:8481_3: evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:8482_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8482_1: kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti. ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8482_2: bhāvaya mā ca sarvākārajñatām anityeti samanupaśya. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:8483_0: sarvākārajñatā svabhāvena śunyā yaḥ sarvākārajñatāyāḥ svabhāvaḥ so 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ
S06sspp2_4u:8483_1: sā prajñāpāramitā yā prajñāpāramitā tatra na sarvākārajñatā nityeti vā anityeti vopalabhyate.
S06sspp2_4u:8483_2: sarvākārajñatā eva tatra na saṃvidyate. kutaḥ punar nityā vā anityā vā bhaviṣyati.
S06sspp2_4u:8483_3: evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām upadekṣyanti.
S06sspp2_4u:8484: punar aparaṃ kauśika te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca teṣāṃ bodhisattvayanikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ caivaṃ prajñāpāramitām upadekṣyanti,
S06sspp2_4u:8485: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvaya mā ca kaṃ cid dharmaṃ samatikramiṣyasi sā kvacid dharme pratiṣṭhāsyati. tat kasya [ŚsP_II-4_244] hetoh?
S06sspp2_4u:8486: tathā hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ saddharmo na saṃvidyate yo dharmaḥ samatikramitavyo yatra vā pratiṣṭhātavyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:8487_0: tathā hi kauśika sarvadharmāḥ svabhāvo na śūnyā yaś ca sarvadharmāṇāṃ svabhāvaḥ so
S06sspp2_4u:8487_1: 'bhāvo yo 'bhāvaḥ sā prajñāpāramitā yā prajñāpāramitā tatra na kaścid dharma āyūhitavyo
S06sspp2_4u:8487_2: vā niryūhitavyo vā utpādayitavyo vā nirodhayitavyo vā,
S06sspp2_4u:8488_0: evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika te kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā na prajñāpāramitāprativarṇikām
S06sspp2_4u:8488_1: upadekṣyanti. tasmāt tarhi kauśika kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyā
S06sspp2_4u:8488_2: artham upadeṣṭavyo evam upadiśantaḥ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8489: na tv eva te paurvakāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca.
S06sspp2_4u:8491: punar aparaṃ kauśika yāvanto jāmbūdvīpakāḥ sattvās tān kascid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06sspp2_4u:8492: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:8494: bhagavān āha: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaved,
S06sspp2_4u:8495: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ parebhyo vistareṇācakṣīt,
S06sspp2_4u:8496_0: deśayet prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayed evaṃ ca vaded ehi
S06sspp2_4u:8496_1: tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitām udgṛhāṇa paryavāpnuhi dhāraya vācaya yoniśaś ca manasikuru
S06sspp2_4u:8496_2: yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratipadyasva. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:8497: ato hi kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāḥ srotaāpannāḥ prabhāvyante.
S06sspp2_4u:8498: tiṣṭhantu kauśika jāmbūdvipakāḥ sattvā yāvantaḥ kauśika cāturdvīpake lokadhātau sattvās tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kiṃ manyase?
S06sspp2_4u:8499: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:8501: bhagavān āha: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaved,
S06sspp2_4u:8502: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ parebhyo vistareṇācakṣīt,
S06sspp2_4u:8503_0: deśayet prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayed evaṃ vadet. ehi tvaṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8503_1: kulaputra prajñāpāramitām udgṛhāṇa paryavāpnuhi dhāraya vācaya yoniśaś ca manasikuru
S06sspp2_4u:8503_2: yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ [ŚsP_II-4_245] pratipadyasva. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:8504: ato hi kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāḥ srotaāpannāḥ prabhāvyante.
S06sspp2_4u:8505_0: tiṣṭhantu kauśika cāturdvīpake lokadhātau sattvāḥ srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ.
S06sspp2_4u:8505_1: yāvantaḥ kauśika sāhasre cūḍike lokadhātau sattvās tān kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā

S06sspp2_4u:8540: deśayed prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayed evaṃ ca vadet,
S06sspp2_4u:8541: ehi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitām udgṛhāṇa paryavāpnuhi dhāraya vācaya yoniśaś ca manasikuru yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratipadyasva. tat kasya hetoḥ?

S06sspp2_4u:8544: tiṣṭhantu kauśika jāmbūdvīpakāḥ sattvāḥ sakṛdāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ,

S06sspp2_4u:8546: kauśikāpi nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:8549: ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet. ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ parebhyo vistareṇācakṣīt,

S06sspp2_4u:8918_1: vācaya yoniśaś ca manasikuru yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratipadyasva. yadā
S06sspp2_4u:8918_2: tvaṃ kulaputra yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratipatsyase. tadā tvaṃ kulaputra
S06sspp2_4u:8921: yadā tvaṃ sarvajñatādharmāṇāṃ lābhī bhaviṣyasi. tadā tvam anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyase. ayaṃ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:8923_0: punar aparaṃ kauśika yāvanto jāmbūdvīpakāḥ sattvās te sarva avaivartikā bhaveyur
S06sspp2_4u:8923_1: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau tebhyaś ca bodhisattvebhyo mahāsattvebhyaḥ kaścid eva
S06sspp2_4u:8923_2: kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ parebhyo vistareṇopadiśed
S06sspp2_4u:8923_3: deśayet prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayet,
S06sspp2_4u:8924: tebhyaś cānyataro bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ vaded ahaṃ kṣipraṃ anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyeyam iti,
S06sspp2_4u:8925: yaś ca tasmai kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahupuṇyaṃ prasavet. imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ vistareṇopadiśed,
S06sspp2_4u:8926: ayam eva sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:8928_0: tiṣṭhantu kauśika jāmbūdvīpakāḥ sattvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau yāvantaḥ kauśika
S06sspp2_4u:8928_1: cāturdvīpake lokadhātau sattvās te sarva avaivartikā bhaveyur anuttarāyaṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
S06sspp2_4u:8928_2: tebhyo bodhisattvebhyaḥ kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8928_3: sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ vistareṇopadised deśayet prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt
S06sspp2_4u:8928_4: saṃprakāśayet tebhyaś cānyataro bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ vaded ehi tvaṃ kṣipraṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8929: yaś ca tasmai kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet. imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ vistarenopadiśet,
S06sspp2_4u:8930: deśayet prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayet,
S06sspp2_4u:8931: ayam eva sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:8932_0: tiṣṭhantu kauśika cāturdvīpake lokadhātau sattvā avaivartikā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
S06sspp2_4u:8932_1: yāvantaḥ kauśika sāhasre cūḍike lokadhātau sattvās te sarva avaivartikā bhaveyur
S06sspp2_4u:8932_2: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau tebhyaś ca bodhisattvebhyo mahāsattvebhyaḥ kaścid eva
S06sspp2_4u:8932_3: kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ vistareṇopadiśed
S06sspp2_4u:8932_4: deśayet prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayed evaṃ cānyataro bodhisattvo
S06sspp2_4u:8932_5: mahāsattva evaṃ vaded ehi tvaṃ kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsya iti,
S06sspp2_4u:8933: yaś ca tasmai kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ vistareṇopadiśed deśayet prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayet,
S06sspp2_4u:8934: ayam eva sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:8935_0: tiṣṭhantu kauśika sāhasre cūḍike lokadhātau sattvā avaivartikā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
S06sspp2_4u:8935_1: yāvantaḥ kauśika dvisāhasre madhyame lokadhātau sattvās te sarva avaivartikā bhaveyur
S06sspp2_4u:8935_2: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau tebhyaś ca bodhisattvebhyo mahāsattvebhyaḥ kaścid eva
S06sspp2_4u:8935_3: kulaputro vā kuladuhhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ vistareṇopadiśet,
S06sspp2_4u:8936: deśayet prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayet. tebhyaś cānyataro bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ vaded ahaṃ kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyam iti,
S06sspp2_4u:8937: yaś ca tasmai kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ vistareṇopadiśed deśayet prakāśayed vicared vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayet,
S06sspp2_4u:8938: ayam eva sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:8940_0: tiṣṭhantu kauśika dvisāhasre madhyame lokadhātau sattvā avaivartikā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau
S06sspp2_4u:8940_1: yāvantaḥ kauśika trisāhasre mahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās te sarva avaivartikā bhaveyur
S06sspp2_4u:8940_2: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau tebhyo mahāsattvebhyaḥ kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā
S06sspp2_4u:8940_3: vā imāṃ prajñāpārāmitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ vistareṇopadiśed deśayet prakāśayed vicared
S06sspp2_4u:8940_4: vibhajed uttānīkuryāt saṃprakāśayet. tebhyaś cānyataro bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ
S06sspp2_4u:8940_5: ca vaded ehi kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsya iti,
S06sspp2_4u:8941: yaś ca tasmai kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sārthāṃ savyañjanāṃ vistareṇopadiśed,
S06sspp2_4u:8942: ayam eva sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet.
S06sspp2_4u:8943: tiṣṭhantu kauśika trisāhasre mahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvā avaivartikā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06sspp2_4u:8944_0: yāvantaḥ kauśika daśasu dikṣv ekaikasyāṃ diśi gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvās
S06sspp2_4u:8944_1: te sarva avaivartikā bhaveyur anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau tebhyo bodhisattvebhyo mahāsattvebhyaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:8945: kaścid eva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ punyaṃ prasavet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:8946_0: avaivartikebhyo hi bodhisattvebhyo nānyārthaṃ dharmam upadeṣṭavyo niyatā hi te saṃbodhi
S06sspp2_4u:8946_1: parāyaṇānate bhuyo vivartittite anuttarāyā samyaksaṃbodher ayam abhū kaścic citaḥ
S06sspp2_4u:8948: atha khalu śakro devānām indro bhagavantam etad avocat:
S06sspp2_4u:8949: yathā yathā bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhyāsī bhavaty anuttārāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhes tathā tathā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dānapāramitāyām avavaditavyo 'nuśāsitavyaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:8955: yathā yathā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhyāsī bhavaty anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhes tathā tathā adhyātmaśūnyatāyām avavaditavyo 'nuśāsitavyaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:8973: yathā yathā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhyāsī bhavaty anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhes tathā tathā smṛtyupasthāneṣv avavaditavyo 'nuśāsitavyaḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:8997_0: te khalu punar bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ dharmasaṃgrahaś cāmiṣasaṃgraheṇaṃ cānuś cānugṛhūnto
S06sspp2_4u:8997_1: bahutaraṃ te kulaputra kuladuhitaraś ca puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyanti. na tv eva te paurvakāḥ
S06sspp2_4u:8997_2: kulaputrā kuladuhitaraś ca. tat kasya hetoḥ?
S06sspp2_4u:9046: athāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānām indram āmantrayate:
S06sspp2_4u:9047: sādhu sādhu kauśika yas tvaṃ bodhisattvebhyā utsāhaṃ dadāsi bodhisattvānām ugṛhīṣve anupārayasi,
S06sspp2_4u:9048_0: evam eṣa tvayā kauśika karaṇīyaṃ ya āryaśrāvakaḥ sattvānām anugrahaṃ kartukāmaḥ sa
S06sspp2_4u:9048_1: bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām [ŚsP_II-4_269] anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāv utsāhaṃ dadhātu
S06sspp2_4u:9048_2: dharmām iṣānugraheṇa ca bodhisattvān anugṛhātv anuparipārayatu. tat kasya hetoh?
S06sspp2_4u:9049_0: ataḥ prasabohi kauśika bhagavataḥ śrāvakasaṃghāḥ yad uta bodhisattvebhyo mahāsattvebhyaḥ
S06sspp2_4u:9049_1: yadi ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye cittan notpādayan na
S06sspp2_4u:9049_2: bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śikṣeta ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu dānapāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ
S06sspp2_4u:9091: nānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ na pratyekabuddhā prajñāparan na śrāvakāḥ,
S06sspp2_4u:9092: yasmāt tarhi kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śikṣate ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu danapāramitāyāṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām.
S06sspp2_4u:9135: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhaiḥ sarvalokadhātuṣu naraka ucchidyante tiryagyoni ucchidyante yamaloka ucchidyante,
S06sspp2_4u:9136: āsurāś ca kāyā parihīyante divyāṃs ca kāyā abhivartante,
S06sspp2_4u:9187: anavakāraśūnyatāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhavati prakṛtiśūnyatāyā loke prādurbhāvo bhavati,
S06sspp2_4u:9216: aṣṭādaśānām āveṇikānāṃ buddhadharmānāṃ loke prādurbhāvo bhavati,
